title: golang blog: error in example
body:
In the blog entry http://blog.golang.org/go-image-package, there is a code example:

b := m.Bounds()
for y := b.Min.Y; y < b.Max.Y; y++ {
 for x := b.Min.X; y < b.Max.X; x++ {
  doStuffWith(m.At(x, y))
 }
}

a typo in the inner loop condition causes it to never terminate. y should be x.
